text: The 1992 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships were held in Bromont, Quebec, Canada from 16 to 17 September 1992. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- |Cross-country | | | |- |Downhill | | | |- |Junior downhill | | | |} ===Women's events=== {| |- |Cross-country | | | |- |Downhill | | | |- |Junior downhill | | | |} ===Medal table=== ==References== ==External links== Category:UCI Mountain Bike World Championships Category:International cycle races hosted by Canada UCI Mountain Bike World Championships Category:Mountain biking events in Canada
title: 1992 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships
